duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide z operating system support services to customers.
Participate in the development of proposals and presentations to management and clients.
Assist in the identification of additional service opportunities.
Serve as a trusted advisor to our clientele.
Work with client and Marketing to assure solution meets the client's business objective.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS degree or equivalent experience required.
Minimum of ten years z related experience is preferred.
Minimum of five years of experience in customer facing environments with good presentation skills is desired.
IBM or other appropriate vendor certifications are desired.
